alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 9:17PM MST until February 22 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ TO 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast California, southern Nevada and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ to 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Periods of blowing dust may also occur resulting in lowered driving visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dust prone areas along I-15 between Baker and Las Vegas, Highway 95 southwest of Boulder City and the Pahrump Valley will likely see periods of blowing dust reducing driving visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
